div.p: [...] If not, they will be stubborn again in the [...] sailors. Before though, every one of the laoi [...]. If he/they deliver (?) 31 aoilia [...] and they have become engaged in the works [...] in order that [...] is provided to them from the royal store [...] it is necessary to take care that not of the sailors [... once they have been] sent [away](?) it will no longer be easy to [bring them back (?) ...] so that they are busy at the works. For if [...] to finish why they do not, disregarding often [...] to know exactly by whom the water [...] as Polydoros writes to you now that the [...] in the 10th year when I was writing the letter to you I was collecting the [...] since you write to me contrarywise. Translation: B. van Beek, P.Petr. Kleon 42
